short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the possible total value that can be achieved using divine orbs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A little extension that shows the range of total values that can be achieved using divine orbs. Currently only high tier ES items are supported. Only works on the official trade website.
